programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A boy, 6, is shot and then abandoned in an emergency room by his fearful mother, sending detectives in search of his missing family and the gunman.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: After George Bailey (James Stewart) wishes he had never been born, an angel (Henry Travers) is sent to earth to make George's wish come true. George starts to realize how many lives he has changed and impacted, and how they would be different if he was never there.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: After George Bailey (James Stewart) wishes he had never been born, an angel (Henry Travers) is sent to earth to make George's wish come true. George starts to realize how many lives he has changed and impacted, and how they would be different if he was never there.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate a series of sexual attacks happening on subways; Benson begins dating a crime reporter.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Munch bonds with a television news reporter (Jennifer Esposito) who was sexually assaulted months earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An abused 7-year-old girl lies comatose while Benson and Stabler try to figure out which member of her dysfunctional family is responsible for her state.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A cop-turned-activist (Eric Roberts) becomes a suspect in the killings of several rapists who were recently paroled.
Athena and the 118 race to the rescue when a fading movie star is plagued by a series of near-death experiences.

The 118 race to the rescue to a renaissance faire; an overbearing boss is poisoned; Athena fears for May's life when she encounters a disturbed young man; Uncle Buck babysits young Jee-Yun as Maddie and Chimney begin house-hunting.

The Santa Ana winds bring in a variety of weirder-than-usual emergencies; a family dog retrieves a severed hand; a young woman sleep-drives into the station; Denny questions Hen and Karen about his biological parents.

A dry thunderstorm rolls over Los Angeles, bringing in a series of lightning strike emergencies for the 118 and leaves a first responder's life hanging in the balance; Chimney get a surprise from a visiting Albert.
As Buck's life hangs in the balance, he dreams of a world where he never became a firefighter, for better and worse.
Despite the case being closed, Bobby is determined to prove his Alcoholics Anonymous sponsor was murdered and bring his killer to justice; Buck struggles with his post-traumatic stress.

The 118 faces emergencies at a spin class and a hair salon; a husband and wife find themselves in a compromising position; Buck discovers new cognitive abilities; Hen and Karen find out Denny has been seeing his biological father.

The 118 race to emergencies at a commercial bakery and a bodybuilding competition; Bobby's annual performance reviews send Chimney to the firefighter academy, where he runs into a familiar face; Eddie's aunt gets involved in his personal life.

A fire breaks out in an accountant's office and a car crashes into a "living funeral"; Athena is shocked when a suspect dies in her custody minutes after she arrests him; Buck is attracted to a death doula; Maddie and Chimney are audited by the IRS.

The 118 race to rescue two roommates desperately trying to find a needle in a haystack at a landfill, and help a woman whose nightmare dream suddenly becomes a painful reality; Athena and Maddie team up to find a missing boy in a crowded mall.

A wedding proposal tragically intersects with a bank robbery; a bride is literally stuck on her way to the altar; Athena talks a victim through her grief; Buck finds a surprise visitor on his doorstep.
A series of freeway car accidents leads to a catastrophic overpass collapse that endangers the lives of civilians and members of the 118.
Athena and Bobby set off on their honeymoon cruise, but when duty calls, their vacation is put on hold; a fighter jet traps a civilian; an unusual incident leaves a couple stuck together.

The disastrous cruise continues when Bobby and Athena respond to the ship's explosion, racing to aid injured passengers; Hen questions her instincts in a life-taking call and grows concerned about Athena and Bobby's whereabouts.

programme.title: Live: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment display their skills and athleticism in weekly episodic programming, as scores are settled and enduring rivalries play out in the ring.

programme.title: Violent Night
programme.desc: An elite team of mercenaries breaks into a family compound on Christmas Eve, taking everyone hostage inside. However, they aren't prepared for a surprise combatant: Santa Claus is on the grounds, and he's about to show why this Nick is no saint.

programme.title: Violent Night
programme.desc: An elite team of mercenaries breaks into a family compound on Christmas Eve, taking everyone hostage inside. However, they aren't prepared for a surprise combatant: Santa Claus is on the grounds, and he's about to show why this Nick is no saint.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The rape of a veteran police officer is first linked to her ex-husband's gambling debts, and then to her fellow officers.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The murder of a software company employee leads Benson and Stabler to a fired co-worker who may have a horrifying motive for the slaying.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An estranged son and a former patient are the prime suspects in the murder of a prominent doctor and the rape of his wife.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Intelligence pursues heroin kingpin Derek Keyes; Lindsay's downward spiral continues; Olinsky tells Platt about a secret from his past; Roman talks to Burgess about his concerns regarding Ruzek.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Roman and Burgess discover the corpse of a young boy who was reported missing; Burgess talks to Ruzek about Roman's suspicious behavior; Bunny plans to make a statement that could impact Voight's career.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: A desperate man searching for his daughter holds a member of the team hostage; Voight learns about the accusations Bunny made regarding a case from his past; Antonio finds out that Olinsky has been keeping a secret.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Arsenal hosts Wolverhampton Wanderers. The Gunners sit atop the Premier League table with a 10-3-2 record and 33 points, while Wolves are 0-2-13 with just two points. David Raya (ARS) has posted a Premier League-high eight clean sheets in 2025-26.

programme.desc: The best moments from the weekend in Premier League action.

programme.title: A Bad Moms Christmas
programme.desc: Under-appreciated and overburdened moms Amy, Kiki and Carla rebel against the challenges and expectations of the Super Bowl for moms: Christmas. As if creating the perfect holiday for their families isn't hard enough, they'll have to do it while hosting and entertaining their own respective mothers when they come to visit.
